name: A Housewife’s Healing Touch
description:
A Housewife’s Healing Touch: Pure Love Route and NTR Route

Shion — a young man unable to manifest his magical powers even after coming of age,
is left in the care of a family that specializes in magical research.
After finally unleashing his potential during a terrible incident, he is taken under the wing of a skilled healer,
Rui who promises to teach him how to control his powers.
But to properly command magic, a man needs a profound knowledge about carnal matters.

Will Shion be able to save Rui from a terrible fate, or will he let her become the village’s plaything?
